title: LAcrosse; lacrosse
brief_description: A slow-motion exploration of the grace and beauty of the women’s game of lacrosse featuring the United States Women’s Lacrosse Association. The women’s game differs significantly in spirit and in rule from the men’s game in that the women have eliminated boundaries and disallowed body contact.
